sections.content: inPowerSuite incorporates all main and expected features of a fully functional e-commerce experience and provides easy fit for those companies wanting to leverage their web sites. Blending flexible shopping arrangements and real-time checkout processing into an existing web site is easy to implement. Customers can search your online catalog, select products and suggested items for their shopping cart, store payment and delivery addresses, and select from different shipping services.

panels.title: Web Store Configurations
listItems: Real-time e-commerce plug-ins and website blending
Member organization events, commissions and rewards programs

panels.title: Key Features & Upsell
listItems: Corporate Website/E-commerce Blending: Supports ease of blending into an existing website
Basic Product / Keyword Search: Supports exact and fuzzy matching
Basic Discount Pricing: Supports multiple discount prices for a product simultaneously
Up/Side-Sell Relationships: Supports unlimited suggestive selling arrangements
Shipping Rates: Supports custom rates and real-time access to UPS online services
Order Confirmation: Provides online and email order confirmations
Order Tracking: Provides ability for returning customers to view order status

panels.title: Payment & Checkout
listItems: Efficient Internet Based Payment Processing: inPowerSuite comes with integrated plug-ins for secured, internet-based, and real-time credit card transaction processing
Comprehensive Checkout: Customer Registration, Address Standardization, Shipping Rates, Sales Tax Calculations, Credit Card Processing, Email Confirmations
Payment Methods: Major Credit Cards including JCB, Debit Cards, Checks, On Account (Invoice), Point of Sale
Payment Processing: Verify and authorize credit card payments, Automated settlement processing, Best-practice encryption techniques

Customer: Customer Configurable Preferences and Profile Information, Sales Rep Assignment and Auto-assign Capability, Email Order and Shipment Confirmation, Online Order Status and Real-time Order Tracking
Performance & Scalability: Highly mature PL/SQL code-base, Optimized for secured web access and transactions
Multiple configurations for scalability
